title: to the riot employee who did this: i hope 2020 brings you THE WORST ever
body:
i dont even care about the rest of the sylas changes.
i dont give a fuck that he has less hp armor and mr at early levels (and more at later levels) i just dont care.

the fact that his e has more than double the damage at max rank
and 5 times as much of an ap scale right away.
WOW!

whoever made this decision.
i sincerely from the bottom of my heart and soul wish you THE ABSOLUTE WORST that can happen to a living creature this year.

i dont even know what exactly i wish you. i wont wish you any illness or death or something. (mainly cause the pure hatred i felt when i read this change isnt satisfied with you dying)
i just hope the worst things possible happen to you.
i hope you feel so much pain and sadness this year that even in death your soul will suffer more than i can imagine.

words or actions cant describe the insane hatred i feel for a person who goes "lets give him x2 x5 times the damage ON AN ASSASSIN"
nothing i could ever say or do to you or anything you love could bring out my hatred for you.
i am dead fucking serious. i hate you more than the person who killed one of my best friends years ago. yup im going this personal.

also to "end this thread on a positive note"
i want to thank you aswell: the first patch of 2020, and its most likely the worst one this entire year.
theres only a handful of things i can imagine that would be worse but none of them will ever happen (like increasing rengars jump damage by 200%)
so thank you. you made it so that even if you sit on my face and fire a load of diarrhea down my throat, it will be better than how you started this year off.
thank you :) thank you for caring and for listening.
